Avalon Northwest Wine News January Avalon Northwest Wine News January Rex Hill winemaker Lynn PennerAsh resigns after years Amicable parting for her own winery PennerAsh Cellars a dream come true Rex Hill awash in recent awards and medals for their wines About PennerAsh Winery PennerAshWineCellarshtm About Lynn PennerAshrexhillwineryhtm Order the wines of Rex Hill and PennerAsh rexhillvineyardshtml Highest Rated Wines We have many new and exciting wines on the site Heres a list with links to some of the wine reviews and winery info or check out the Highest Rated Wines page to see everything in one place Highest Rated Wine List highestratednwwineshtm New Beaux Freres Pinot Noirs beauxfrereshtml Andrew Rich Many New Wines andrewrichwineryhtml Broadley Pinot Noirs Harvest report and new vintage winesBroadleyhtm Chehalem Pinot Noir and Gris Rion Reserve his best ever new Grischehalemhtm Fiddlehead Cellars Pinot Noirs in stock We are so thrilled to have received a stock of all of Kathys Oregon Pinot Noirs available now and drinking beautifully fiddleheadhtm Hamacher Pinot Noir A rising star Parker hammachercellarshtm High Pass Sleeper winery two highest rated wines A dessert wine and a reserve Pinot Noir that are going to put this winery on the maphighpasshtm Mike Januiks new Winery Former winemaker Columbia CrestJanuikWineryhtm Ken Wright Pinot Noirs in Stock and on sale kenwrightcellarshtml Ken Wright Pinot Noir Futures on sale kenwrightcellarshtml Lemelson Wine Spectator Hot Wine of the Week Beautifully designed new winery now in full operation LemelsonVineyardshtm PennerAsh Cellars Lynn goes fulltime New Syrah and Pinot Noirs PennerAshWineCellarshtm Quilceda Creek Red Table Wine New offering from the famous winery quilcedacreekhtml Rex Hill Single Vineyard Pinot Noirs Top Wine of the World rexhillwineryhtm Rex Hill Jacob Hart Wine of the Week WPNWandyperduecolumnshtm Seven Hills Merlot and Syrah on Sale All about this pioneering Washington Winerysevenhillswineryhtm SALE WINES PRICE REDUCTIONS AT ALL LEVELS Well maybe the economy or maybe a slow Xmas but prices are at great levels this month with lots of wines reduced to the lowest Ive seen in seven years Check out the sales here bestvaluenorthwestwineshtml Woodward Canyon Stone Wolf Seven Hills Snoqualamie Reininger Preston Patton Valley Argyle Panther Creek Ken Wright Gordon Brothers and many many more Nest week new releases preorders and futures galore Rabbit Corkscrew Silver or black color and free shipping Includes foil cutter and storage case rabbitcorkscrewhtm NW Wine NewsBroadley and Beaux Freres Sales New ReleasesAvalon Northwest Wine and Gourmet News January Sales on Broadley and Beaux Freres new releases Jeans Picks Broadley Pinot Noir and Marcile Loraine Claudias Choice at great prices Broadleyhtm All about the Broadleys from San Francisco sophistication to Monroe Oregon Broadleyhtm Beaux Freres Pinot Noir and Single Vineyard Pinot Noirs Beaux Freres has just released some excellent Pinot noirs under their Belles Soeurs label and we have them at reduced prices through February th Their Shea Vineyard Pinot noir is the best we have tried from that vineyard and the Wild Thing Pinot Noir is a great ready to drink Pinot with big rustic and robust flavors Beaux Freres signature Pinot Noir Beaux Freres Vineyard is available at less than the Dont miss this chance to stock up at very reasonable prices Read about and order the wines here beauxfrereshtml Read about the vintage and previous vintages here BeauxFrereshtm New Releasesnorthwestwinehtml the whole list over wines HIGHLIGHTS OF THE NEW RELEASES Adelsheim Pinot Noir Elizabeths Reserve Pinot Noir Goldschmidt Vineyard Pinot Noir Bryan Creek Pinot Noir adelsheimvineyardhtml Domaine Drouhin Pinot Noir A beautiful wine elegant and polished The nose is delicate with hints of truffle black pepper warm black fruit cassis and a hint of earthiness The flavors are of black plum cassis hints of saddle leather vanilla subtle layers and layer of anise licorice pepper allspice cinnamon red cherry fresh woodsy forest The length and depth of the finish distinguishes this wine Cellar up to ten years but its beautiful nowdomainedrouhinpinotnoirhtml LEcole Pepper Bridge Apogee LEcole Merlot Walla Walla Seven Hills Wine Spec rating points for vintage We are so pleased to announce that we now carry the full line of LEcoles wines in stock after years of spotty availability The Syrah is sold out but everything else is available at great prices Wine reviews and ordering here lecolewineryhtml Argyle Pinot Noir SALE Regular Argyles vintage Pinot Noir is available now and its time to stock up on this excellent value before the reviews come out The Pinot Noir is a bright deep ruby red The aromas are of a complex combination of spices cardamom cinnamon vanilla black fruits and earth Flavors lean toward black fruits black cherries and blackberries with a small earthy and seasoned cedar component Mediumbodied this wine is unctuous with big fruit and a firm tannin finish sanded by sweetness from the fruit flavors The finish is long with a nice balance between sweet ripe fruit and soft chewy tannins Drink now or cellar three to four years argylewineshtml Penner Ash Pinot Noir Penner Ash Syrah Lynn PennerAsh has left Rex Hill to spend fulltime at her family winery and here is their new Pinot Noir and their very limited Syrah cases made The Pinot is a blend of grapes from Rex Hills JacobHart Seven Springs and Weber vineyards Order now for delivery in Summer PennerAshWineCellarshtm Reininger Walla Walla Valley Winery reiningerhtm Merlot A very fruit forward wellbalanced wine displaying tantalizing flavors The nose greets you with black fruits hints of tobacco and whispers of coconut and vanillin The mouth bursts with bing cherries while the finish suggests essences of Russian olive and light oak Elegant structure gives this wine moderate aging ability though is very enjoyable now Cabernet Sauvignon A very rich and complex wine dark red in color Flavors of ripe plum and vanillin lead off the nose with hints of spice mocha and black fruits in the mouth The wellrounded tannins make the expansive mouth feel soft yet structured A big lingering finish completes this gorgeous wine Points Wine Enthusiast Syrah A wine possessing deep rich color The nose reflects aromas of baking spices and blueberries while the mouth hints of raspberries and apricots The very light influence of oak allows the true essence of the fruit be revealed The wine is very soft in the mouth with wellintegrated tannins that define a very balanced wine with an elegant seamless finish Double Gold San Francisco International Wine Competition reiningerhtm Seven Hills Winery sevenhillswineryhtm Theres a new article by our staff writer Christina Kelly on the Seven Hills Winery heresevenhillswineryhtm Syrah very limited Softer tannins and very broad full midpalate flavors characterize this wine The aroma is of red fruits and smoky Syrah varietal character surrounded by complex oak tones of spice and vanilla Theres a great balance on the palate with a natural harmony and brightness between fruit acidity and tannins Order heresevenhillswineryhtml Jeans Choices this month I dont usually put my own preferences out but this month there are some great sleeper wines and some excellent prices that you might miss while wandering through the pages that are the Avalon site Argh How did I do that Ive been tasting wines like crazy for the last month and some of these are really lovely but they havent been reviewed yet or they are too obscure to hit the press So here for what its worth are the wines that as work on the website I type in and say to myself I hope they find this its a good one Andrew Rich Cuvee B Pinot Noir Cuvee B Pinot Noir is made from the same grapes as his regular Pinot Noir but from younger vines or graes that did not quite make the cut for his blend This is a happy mood making easy drinking Pinot with lots of spice and soft red cherry fruit A GREAT DEALandrewrichcuveebhtml Beaux Freres Belles Soeurs Shea regular The best wine from Shea Vineyard Ive ever had Incredibalievable A yumm bucket beauxfreresbellessoeurssheahtml Broadley Marcile Loraine Morgan Broadley told me a restaurants staff that came to the winery to taste drank up his whole tasting bottle in a jiffy and I can tell you they had good reason to This is stellar Pinot Noir in the Broadley tradition VERY VERY LIMITED The nose was full of truffles and bitter chocolate and a hint of licorice that I find in most of the Broadley estate wines The flavors were layered and complex with every kind of spice and seasoning entwined with big black fruit cassis plum and blackberry The finish went on for minutes I think The Claudias Choice is just as good in its own wayBroadleyMarcileLorainehtml Fiddlehead Pinot Noir Kathy Josephs is one of the nicest people you could ever hope to meet and she makes wonderful Pinot Noir Based in Santa Barbara she is better known in CA In she started making a limited bottling of Oregon Pinot Noir and we are so fortunate to have a supply of this wonderful wine I tried it and it is drinking beautifully and showing all the complexity and intriguing mystery of well made well aged Pinot Noir The wine has been perfectly cellared since bottling with no exposure to heat or shipping trauma I suggest a vertical tasting of her wines we have the and available This wine is well worth a try if only to see what well made Oregon Pinot Noir is capable of five years outfiddleheadhtm High Pass Pinot Noir Walnut Ridge Vineyard High Pass Scheurbe Late Harvest ml Dieter Boehms vineyards are a stones throw from Big Pink Avalons farm and web office and as with Broadley a stones throw in a different direction theres world class wine in the hills of the Monroe and Junction City High Pass is the classic sleeper winery making wines that the most experienced wine judges I know are ranking at the top of the list Both of these wines are outstanding examples of their type I wish I could afford to take home more of the late harvest wine I cant pronounce it but I sure like it I thought is was as good as some of the ice wines from Canada And the Pinot is rich almost buttery with a meaty hit that would stand up well to roast leg of lamb This could be a great choice for Easter dinnerhighpasshtm Patricia Green Cellars Pinot Noir Estate This wine tastes a lot like Beaux Freres signature Pinot Noir their Beaux Freres Vineyard Pinot Noir The vineyard is right next to Beaux Freres vineyard so it makes sense and Patricia is already pulling great fruit from it In a few years this will be the wine she is best known for Or so I think Huge Patty Green nose with warm luscious black cherry and cassis hits along with a dense earthy undertone that is rich and pleasant The flavors are of dark blak fruits spices like cinnamon allspice nutmeg a hint of violets and roses and elegant complexity The finish is long and silky Patty is one of my favorite winemakers her jolly disposition and passion for wine show through in all of her delicious wines producthtml Thomas Pinot Noir He makes very little wine and some vintages there is no wine as he does not find the grapes up to his standards When he does drop by with wine we dance in delight A wine made with passion and great finesse age for up to years classicly Burgundian with layers and layers of fruit spice char and oak and exotic hints of rose cinnamon and incense thomaswinerypinotnoirhtml Highest Rated Wines highestratednwwineshtml Sale Wines bestvaluenorthwestwineshtml GIVE EUPHORIA TRUFFLES FOR VALENTINES If you are from Oregon you know Euphoria Chocolate Company Based in Eugene they are famous for their fresh chocolate truffles huge gobs of chocolate fresh cream and fruit and liquor flavors Check them out hereeuphoriachocolatetruffleshtml Thanks so much for your patronage Jean Ann Carl and Teresa Jean Yates wwwavalonwinecom wwworegongourmetcom SW nd Street Corvallis OR Click here to unsubscribe from future mailings leaveavalonnews

Avalon Northwest Wine News February Avalon Northwest Wine and Gourmet News February Andrew Will Merlots PennerAsh purchases vineyard Interview with Tony Soter NEWS and ARTICLES Tony Soter Return of an Oregon Native by Cole Danehower Oregon Wine Report Tony Soter is one of the most respected winemakers in the business His consulting clients have included such elite California labels as Araujo Estate NiebaumCoppola Dalla Valle Moraga Vineyards Spottswoode and Viader Vineyardnot to mention his own Pinot noirfocused creation Etude Winery recently sold to Beringer Blass sotervineyardshtm PennerAsh has purchased vineyard land near Beaux Freres and Patty Green Cellars PennerAshWineCellarshtm NW Wine of the Week from Andy Perdue Powers Parallel This affordable red blend was ranked No last week at the annual Pacific Northwest Wine Fair in Toronto Other wines in the judging included Ridge Montebello Hedges Red Mountain Reserve Gordon Brothers Tradition and pepper Bridge Cabernet Sauvignon At the Powers wine was the least expensive of the entrants Gorgeous bottle too andyperduecolumnshtm NEW RELEASES northwestwinehtml the whole list Highlights Andrew Will Merlots Pepper Bridge Seven Hills Klipsun Ciel du Cheval Sheridan Chris Camardas delicious and hard to get Merlots vintage is made from his best fruit ever Robert Parker says of Chriss wines Andrew Wills wines have virtually perfect tannins They are present but buffered by the loads of dominating sweet fruit Furthermore what is amazing about Chris Camardas wines is that they are concentrated yet grateful Camardas wines blend power with elegance concentration with finesse and supersweet fruit with definition Chris Camarda is a brilliant winemaker Vintage notes andrewwillwineryhtm Tasting notes and pricing andrewwillwineryhtml Adelsheim Pinot Noir Goldschmidt Vineyard Pinot from the vineyard owned by the former governor of Oregon adelsheimpinotnoirgoldschmidthtml Beaux Freres single vineyard Belle Soeurs Sale is almost over Temperance Hill Shea Wild Thing Pinot noirs We are in love with them dont miss the great prices My employees have raved about these wines esp the Shea massive raspberry nose hedonistic beauxfrereshtml Also just in Domaine Coteau Pinot Noir Domaine Lemoyne Pinot Gris Eugene Wine Cellars new vintages Fiddlehead back in stock Hamacher Januik Cabernets LEcole Apogee LEcole entire product line now in stock New vintages from Reininger Powers Pepper Bridge Shea Vineyards Pinot noir Stonecroft northwestwinehtml COMING SOON Woodward Canyon Old Vine Cab Merlot available next month Email us to reserve Highest Rated Wines highestratednwwineshtml Sale Wines bestvaluenorthwestwineshtml Thanks so much for your patronage Jean Ann Carl and Teresa Jean Yates wwwavalonwinecom wwworegongourmetcom SW nd Street Corvallis OR Click here to unsubscribe from future mailings leaveavalonnews
